item.description:
Come for the mystery, come for the intrigue, come for the excitement!

There's a riddle for waiting for you at the Red-Light Rendezvous! Pick your riddle card and name tag up at the door, proceed to the Meetup point (see: How to find us above) and recruit up to 3 team members. Turn your riddle card in at the bar. Solve the riddle and win a drink! (one per person, 4 people max, no shots, must be at the venue when the winning team is announced at 9:30).

Excite your night with such tantalizing drinks as the Gin Blossom (white grape, cucumber, elder flower), the White Lie (grapefuity), the Diablo (spicy!) and the Broken Heart (sweet and sour, my personal fave). When you're tying one on, mix and mingle and meet the other singles!

Lolita's quickly became a favorite because the vibe is chill, the drinks are strong, the food is amazing and the people are spicy!

❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

 

Mingling and taking the edge off a bit are our only concerns! :)

 

❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

INVITED MEETUP GROUPS:

Boston Singles:

http://www.meetup.com/BostonSingles/

Social Fun:

http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/events/118646802/

Free And Cheap Things in Boston:

http://www.FACT-Boston.com/

Awesome In Boston:

http://www.meetup.com/Awesome-In-Boston/

Boston Nights:

http://www.meetup.com/bostonnights/

Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

http://www.meetup.com/BMSocial/events/120504042/

The Middle (30-45):

http://www.meetup.com/The-Middle-30-45-yrs/

❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

Lolita's is literally steps from the Copley Station on the Green Line. Parking is available on Newbury and Boylston Streets and is pretty easy to find around that time, except it's a little more difficult when the weather is warm. Meters stop at 8 PM.

Come on out and have a blast!

See you there!

~Matt
item.how_to_find_us: After you pass the coat check and go down two steps, go all the way to the left. Find us at the back bar, the furthest point into Lolita's that you can go.
item.name: Riddle at the Red-Light Rendezvous - A Fun New Singles Mixer - 210 Total RSVP's
